title: Brown lentil dal
ingredients: ['200g brown lentils, soaked for at least 12 hours', '1 onion', '1 red pepper', '1 garlic clove', '1 tablespoon cooking oil (coconut, peanut)', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 (400g) tin peeled tomatoes', '1 (400ml) tin coconut milk', '250ml water', 'salt and pepper']
